An episiotomy or any tears 
should heal quickly.  If you 
have any concerns, ask your 
midwife when they visit you at 
home, or contact your GP.
The future
You should make a full 
recovery.  An assisted vaginal 
delivery	should	not	affect	your	
ability to become pregnant or 
deliver a baby in the future.
Summary
An assisted vaginal delivery 
is a common procedure and 
is usually a safe method of 
delivery for you and your baby.
